intro: Getuonis, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its velvety, heart-shaped leaves and showy, tubular flowers. The plant typically grows in shaded, humid environments and prefers well-draining soil. Getuonis is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements. It produces flowers in a variety of colors, including purple, pink, white, and red.
